price: Y al yinn lo había creado ya antes de fuego.
arabic: وَٱلۡجَآنَّ خَلَقۡنَٰهُ مِن قَبۡلُ مِن نَّارِ ٱلسَّمُومِ
footnotes: antes: Antes que al ser humano.

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wal-jāna khalaqnāhu min qablu min nāri al-samūmi
